title: Downstream.2010.BDRip.XviD-BRiGHT
description:
Genre: Action, Sci-Fi

Rating:6.5/13(Votes)

Country:USA

Languages:English

Plot Outline: The future of America, when the world runs out of oil.


Plot: Wes Keller is a young man living in a world where oil has collapsed, the food supply has been wiped out, and cancer rates for women have skyrocketed, depleting the female population. In a barbaric environment where bio fuel, batteries, bullets and people are currency and marauders roam free, Wes tries to escape to a mythical world run on cold fusion "Plutopia", a place that may only exist in the mind. THE BILL IS DUE. 'Downstream' is a view of the not so distant future. We follow a young man (everyone's son) as he pays the price for society's decadence.
